channel.title: Needing some help with my coding, little server tweek only
channel.description:
i need a code to make it so that the person needs to have an account with character-ismember = 1 instead of 0.
or they need a character file before they can log in
thanks this will be [b]VERY[/b] appreciated!

item.title: Needing some help with my coding, little server tweek only
item.dc:creator: @i_own_pking i_own_pking
item.description:
@i_own_pking wrote:

its already with a 1 if i change to 0 that just sets if the players a member, i want it so u need to be a member to log in and if your not you cant

item.title: Needing some help with my coding, little server tweek only
item.dc:creator: @Zanzibar Zanzibar
item.description:
@Zanzibar wrote:

This Is Quite Simple Actually I Think…
Open Client.Java. CTRL+F public boolean ResetPlayerVars() {
Under That You’ll See Something Like This teleportToX = 0; teleportToY = 0; heightLevel = 0; playerRights = 0; playerIsMember = 0; playerMessages = 0; playerLastConnect = ""; playerLastLogin = 20050101; playerEnergy = 0; playerEnergyGian = 0; playerFollowID = -1; playerGameTime = 0; playerGameCount = 0;
Change playerIsMember = 0;
To playerIsMember = 1;
